summary: "The 40-Year-Old Virgin" is a 2005 comedy film directed by Judd Apatow. It stars Steve Carell as Andy, a 40-year-old man who has never had sex. His co-workers, played by Paul Rudd, Romany Malco, and Seth Rogen, try to help him change that. Catherine Keener plays Trish, Andy's love interest. Inspired by Carell's performance in "Anchorman," Apatow cast him in the lead. Filmed in California, the movie was a hit, making over $177 million worldwide. Critics liked it, especially Carell's performance and the funny yet respectful humor. The film was even named one of the top 10 films of 2005 by the American Film Institute.
title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
